summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Renault Trucks warranty registration system focusing on branch system and staff management features. All core functionality working with 96.2% backend success rate and functional frontend integration.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Returns 520 error when fetching all records (no filters)

design_issues.issue: Logout functionality not easily discoverable in UI

passed_tests: 5 Branch System - All branches (Bursa(1), İzmit(2), Orhanlı(3), Hadımköy(4), Keşan(5)) working
Work Order Branch Extraction - 40216001 correctly extracts branch code 4
Admin Dashboard - Shows all 5 branches with statistics
Staff Management - Create/edit/delete staff users with branch assignment
Staff Branch Restrictions - Staff can only see their branch records
Branch Selection Required - PDI/Damaged/RoadAssist require branch selection
Record Type Filtering - All 4 record types (Standard, PDI, Damaged, RoadAssist) working
Record Creation Forms - Proper validation and branch handling
File Upload System - Photo/video/PDF upload working
API Authentication - Token-based auth working correctly
Mobile Responsive Design - Interface adapts to mobile viewport
Record Display - WhatsApp-like interface showing record history

success_percentage.frontend: 90% - All major UI components functional with minor UX improvements needed
